title: I have not received my Poro celebration Icon yet!!!!!!
body: EVERYBODY on my friend's list has their Poro Icon AND their free Kayle skin/mystery gift  and I haven't received mine yet. I've been playing recently (since way before the announcement) so I can't think of a reason why I haven't gotten mine yet :/   why Rito why????? it's already Saturday!!!! >:(

replies.body: Not everybody has gotten their gift yet.  There are a lot of accounts to go over, so it's going to take time and not everything will be sent out at once.  Stay updated at our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) until this is all done.  Hang tight!
The gifts are still being distributed, with the 23rd being the last day, so just hang in there. If you don't receive it by the 23rd, then you can submit a support ticket.
